mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wainwright Tomb, interior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sullivan, Louis H. (American architect, 1856-1924) [architect]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: View of interior showing ceiling and decoration

"...a mausoleum located in Bellefontaine Cemetery in St. Louis, Missouri. Originally constructed for Charlotte Dickson Wainwright in 1892, the tomb also contains the remains of her husband, Ellis Wainwright. The mausoleum was designed by noted Chicago school architect Louis Sullivan, who also designed the Wainwright Building for Ellis Wainwright." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wainwright_Tomb [work]
